name: Pixel Survival (itch) (Cat.Exe)
description:
⚠ The game is in prototype stage, the text below is only a speech 

A 2D game in top view (With a PICO8 palette for the moment) , You must survive in a gigantic procedurally generated world.

In this world you will be free to build, explore, hunt, mine, farm and more!

------ Control -------

  • A, W, S, D to move
  • ESC to quit
